suspend.help: Suspend the rave. Useful to make modifications on it. The rave can be continued again calling its command with the new arguments.

quit.help: Stops the rave and delete all rave roles

hue_cycle.name: hue-cycle
hue_cycle.help: Starts a 'Hue Cycle' rave. Needs one role. The role will have its color changed in a cycle periodically

step.description: How much the color will change each time. Goes from 0 to 1

speed.description: The time between each color change in seconds

members.description: The members that will receive the rave role

crazy.help: Starts a 'Crazy' rave. A certain amount of roles will change their color to a random value periodically

amount.description: How much different colors at the same time

speed.description: The time between each color change in seconds

members.description: The members that will receive the rave role
